title: Detox Moroccan-Spiced Chickpea Glow Bowl
directions: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onion; saute until soft. Add the garlic, spices, salt, and chickpeas – stir until very fragrant. Add the tomatoes (undrained) and simmer for 20 minutes while you prep the other ingredients.
Chop the cucumber, cook the couscous, and mince the herbs. Arrange bowls with desired amounts of all ingredients. Voila!
ingredients: 1 tablespoon each – chili powder and cumin
1 teaspoon each – turmeric and garam masala
dash of each -cinnamon and cayenne (to taste)
